headline: Is SLB Offering Value After Mixed Returns And Strong Cash Flow Forecasts In 2025?
summary: Wondering if SLB at around $38.90 is quietly turning into a value opportunity, or if the easy money has already been made? Let's dig into what the market is really pricing in. Over the last week SLB is up 1.6%, with a 5.3% gain over 30 days, while it is only 1.3% higher year to date, 3.1% over 1 year, and still down 19.0% over 3 years despite a 102.7% gain over 5 years. Those mixed returns are landing against a backdrop of steady contract wins, expanding international drilling activity, and...
